title: General Counsel
label: General Counsel
description: Leads legal strategy, risk management, and compliance for the enterprise, responsible for contract management, litigation oversight, regulatory compliance, and corporate governance.
responsibilities: Set legal strategy and manage legal department
Oversee contract negotiation and management
Manage litigation and regulatory compliance
Advise board and executive team on legal matters
Ensure corporate governance and ethics programs
Oversee intellectual property protection
traditionalWorkflow: Manually review all contracts (10-30 hours per major contract)
Reactive litigation management (respond to lawsuits after filed)
Annual compliance audits with manual evidence gathering
Board meetings require 10-20 hours of manual prep
Vendor contracts managed in filing cabinets or shared drives
agenticWorkflow: AI contract review flags issues in minutes (vs hours/days)
Predictive litigation analytics forecast case outcomes
Continuous compliance monitoring with real-time alerts
Board packages auto-generated with relevant legal updates
Contract repository with AI search and obligation tracking
painPointsAddressed: Compliance violations detected real-time (vs annual audits)

title: Compliance Director
label: Compliance Director
description: Manages enterprise-wide compliance programs across regulatory domains including privacy (GDPR/CCPA), industry-specific regulations (PCI, HIPAA, SOX), and ethical standards.
responsibilities: Design and implement compliance programs
Monitor regulatory changes and update policies
Conduct compliance training and awareness
Manage compliance audits and certifications
Investigate and remediate compliance violations
Report compliance status to board and regulators
traditionalWorkflow: Manual tracking of regulatory changes via newsletters
Annual compliance audits with manual evidence collection
Policy updates distributed via email (low read rates)
Training completion tracked in spreadsheets
Violations discovered months after occurrence
agenticWorkflow: AI monitors regulatory changes, auto-updates policy drafts
Continuous compliance monitoring with real-time scoring
Targeted training auto-assigned based on role and gaps
Automated evidence collection for audits and certifications
Real-time violation alerts with guided remediation

title: Contract Manager
label: Contract Manager
description: Manages contract lifecycle from negotiation through renewal, ensuring favorable terms, obligation tracking, and risk mitigation across vendor, customer, and partner agreements.
responsibilities: Negotiate and draft contracts
Track contract obligations and renewals
Manage contract repository and version control
Coordinate with legal, procurement, and business teams
Monitor contract compliance and performance
Analyze contract spend and optimization opportunities
traditionalWorkflow: Contracts stored in filing cabinets or shared drives
Manual tracking of renewal dates in spreadsheets
Contract negotiation takes 2-6 months per major contract
Obligation tracking via manual review and calendars
Contract searches take hours (no centralized repository)
agenticWorkflow: AI contract repository with instant search and analytics
Auto-alerts for renewal dates 90/60/30 days in advance
AI-assisted negotiation with clause recommendations
Automated obligation extraction and tracking
Contract risk scoring and optimization recommendations
painPointsAddressed: Missed renewals reduced to near-zero (automated alerts)

title: Chief Privacy Officer (CPO)
label: Chief Privacy Officer (CPO)
description: Manages enterprise privacy programs ensuring compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and other data protection regulations, overseeing data subject rights, privacy impact assessments, and breach response.
responsibilities: Design and implement privacy programs
Ensure compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy laws
Manage data subject access requests (DSARs)
Conduct privacy impact assessments (PIAs)
Oversee data breach response and notification
Train employees on privacy best practices
traditionalWorkflow: Manual DSAR processing takes 10-30 days per request
Privacy impact assessments conducted sporadically
Data inventory maintained in spreadsheets (always outdated)
Breach detection delayed by weeks/months
Privacy training annual with low completion rates
agenticWorkflow: Automated DSAR processing in 1-3 days (vs 10-30)
AI-powered PIAs triggered automatically for new projects
Real-time data inventory with automated classification
Breach detection and response within hours (vs weeks)
Continuous privacy training with role-based micro-learning
painPointsAddressed: DSAR response time reduced 80% (1-3 days vs 10-30)
PIA coverage increased to 100% of applicable projects

title: Intellectual Property Counsel
label: Intellectual Property Counsel
description: Manages intellectual property portfolio including patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets, ensuring protection, enforcement, and strategic alignment with business objectives.
responsibilities: Manage patent and trademark portfolio
Conduct IP due diligence for M&A and partnerships
Monitor and enforce IP rights against infringement
Negotiate IP licensing agreements
Advise on open source and third-party IP usage
Develop IP strategy aligned with business goals
traditionalWorkflow: IP portfolio tracked in spreadsheets with manual updates
Trademark searches conducted manually (days per search)
Infringement monitoring periodic (quarterly/annual)
Licensing agreement negotiation takes 3-12 months
Prior art searches labor-intensive (20-40 hours)
agenticWorkflow: AI IP portfolio management with automated tracking
Instant trademark searches with conflict analysis
Continuous infringement monitoring with real-time alerts
AI-assisted licensing with benchmark term suggestions
Automated prior art searches in minutes
painPointsAddressed: Trademark search time reduced 90% (instant vs days)

title: Litigation Manager
label: Litigation Manager
description: Manages litigation portfolio including lawsuits, disputes, and regulatory investigations, coordinating with outside counsel and implementing strategies to minimize legal exposure.
responsibilities: Manage litigation portfolio and case strategy
Coordinate with outside counsel and expert witnesses
Oversee discovery and document production
Negotiate settlements and alternative dispute resolution
Monitor case budgets and legal spend
Analyze litigation trends and risk exposure
traditionalWorkflow: Case tracking in spreadsheets with manual updates
Discovery document review manual (10-40 hours per case)
Outside counsel spend tracked reactively (budget overruns common)
Settlement analysis subjective (no predictive data)
Litigation trends identified annually (if at all)
agenticWorkflow: AI case management with automated status tracking
AI-powered document review (90% faster discovery)
Real-time legal spend tracking with budget alerts
Predictive analytics for settlement recommendations
Continuous trend analysis identifying risk patterns
